results.title: Metformin Prevents the Progression of Dysplastic Mucosa of the Head and Neck to Carcinoma in Nondiabetic Patients.
results.text_hl: METHODS: We present 3 cases in which adjuvant @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy was used to treat recurrent and multifocal @<m>DISEASE_Dysplastic_Nevus_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004416 @@@dysplastic lesions@@@ in previously treated nondiabetic @DISEASE_Head_and_Neck_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D006258 @@@HNC@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
